categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: During the New Republic Era, Jedi Master Luke Skywalker of the Jedi Order undertook a mission to Elphrona with his Padawan and nephew, Ben Solo and the explorer Lor San Tekka to find Jedi artifacts. During the course of the mission, they encountered the Knights of Ren, an enclave of masked warriors.

In the High Republic Era, in a time of expanded Jedi activity throughout the galaxy, Elphrona was visited by the Jedi Order, who constructed an outpost within the side of a cliff. The Jedi used the outpost as a treasure trove, storing a number of artifacts within.

During the New Republic Era, as Jedi Master Luke Skywalker's rebuilt the Jedi Order, Skywalker and his Padawan Ben Solo visited Elphrona alongside his explorer Lor San Tekka, who had learned of the planet and its outpost. Skywalker and Tekka discussed the High Republic Era and that it was a period when the Jedi greatly expanded beyond the Core Worlds.

Solo was unpleased over the length of their journey, traveling to the edge between the known galaxy and unexplored space. Snoke took the opportunity to sow seeds of doubt about the Jedi in Solo's mind, telling the young apprentice that they had a history of hoarding knowledge and power, and considering themselves as masters of the Force and that Skywalker was holding him back in his evolution as a Jedi. Snoke reassured him however that Skywalker would eventually come to know Solo's true capabilities, but at the moment he saw his student as nothing more than a child.

Skywalker had learnt of the outpost, and hoped to retrieve the artifacts that lay within but were met by Ren and the Knights confronted Skywalker, who had visited the outpost alongside with Solo and Tekka. Ren declared that the artifacts belonged to the Knights, threatening Skywalker. The Jedi Master, however, wished to prevent the Knights of Ren from taking the artifacts.

Ren then ignited his lightsaber, and the Knights surrounded Skywalker and Solo. However, despite being outnumbered, Skywalker managed to incapacitate the Knights, destroying their weapons. With the Knights defeated, Ren stepped forward to face the Jedi himself. Though Skywalker conceeded that he was indeed one man, the Jedi knew that he was not alone with the Force as his ally. Ren revealed that he had activated a kill switch on his lightsaber, which would cause it to explode if it left his hand.

However, as Skywalker was too strong to handle, Ren chose to leave with the rest of the Knights. Before departing, Ren pointed out the presence of the dark side in Solo, and removed his mask, telling Solo that he could take other paths in life. Ren threw his helmet onto the ground, and told Solo to contact him if he ever wished to learn about the dark side.
